before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"5f5c1","text":"Place 1 sterile 15ml falcon tube on ice per snail to be shed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ckg6t","text":"Pre-chill benchtop centrifuge to 4°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fl11v","text":"Prepare 1x DPBS+2% anti-anti and place in 37°C reciprocating water bath (see recipes in \"MATERIALS\" section)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e7pu4","text":"Prepare somule media and place in 37°C reciprocating water bath (see recipes in \"MATERIALS\" section)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1uk4b","text":"Free-living aquatic S. mansoni cercariae transform into the first intramammalian stage, called schistosomula or somules, by burrowing in the host skin. Upon contact, cercariae begin to enter the skin and lose their tails, becoming schistosomula. Somules migrate through the epidermis to the dermis to find a small venule or lymphatic vessel to enter the vasculature.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":20,"length":11},{"style":"italic","offset":87,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dd4sc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ravo","text":"Transformation of cercariae to schistosomula can be mimicked in the laboratory by centrifuging cercariae to remove tails and then culturing the somules in somule media. This method is particularly useful when the number of cercariae is low (i.e. clonal cercariae from an individual snail).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bf88v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"13avq","text":"Somules can be cultured for several weeks with regular media changes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"38fqt","text":"Media changes and opening of transformed somules to take place in tissue culture hood using sterile techniques","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"5q2qs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1osr","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3r1h4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"citation","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"authors":"Paul F. Basch","can_edit":true,"date":354931200,"doi":"10.2307/3280632","guid":"87661660CF1911EDB4BA716A1EC31138","id":2194,"journal":"The Journal of Parasitology","protocol_id":null,"title":"Cultivation of Schistosoma mansoni In vitro. I. Establishment of Cultures from Cercariae and Development until Pairing"}}}}

references.title: Cultivation of Schistosoma mansoni In vitro. I. Establishment of Cultures from Cercariae and Development until Pairing

related_materials.name: 1000 mL Vacuum Filter/Storage Bottle System 0.22 µm Pore 54.5cm² PES Membrane Sterile 12

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"33gmo","text":"Shed cercariae from snails in a 6-well plate (see protocol \"Schistosoma mansoni cercariae shedding\"). The snails can be shed for up to 2 hrs by collecting cercariae and replacing with fresh water every 30 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":60,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ll40","text":"Using a sterile transfer pipette, dispense cercariae into sterile 15ml falcon tubes on ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d5u1e","text":"After collecting cercariae, adjust the volume in each 15ml falcon tube to 15ml with sterile water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8eqkk","text":"Quickly remove the supernatant and resuspend the pellet in 10ml pre-warmed 1x PBS + 2% PSF (see \"MATERIALS\" section for recipes) by gently inverting the tube (do not use pipet to mix)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fujo2","text":"Resuspend pellet of somules in ~5ml pre-warmed   somule media (see \"MATERIALS\" section for recipes)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":47,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e8rm5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"6C7E5940CF2611EDB4BA716A1EC31138","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"77ks3","text":"Optional: the following day, remove tails with transfer pipet (the tails will have floated to the top of the water column in the wells)  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":135,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fdf36","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"8B80BBD0CF2611EDB4BA716A1EC31138","height":406,"id":358682,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4dtl5","text":"Somules the day after transformation, after removing tails (Image credit: Dr. Gabriel Rinaldi)","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Screenshot 2019-03-16 at 22.05.45.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k8i6bdu5f.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k8i4bdu5f.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k8i5bdu5f.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k8i3bdu5f.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"75e5f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"217mf","text":"Place somules in a 6-well plate and top up each well with pre-warmed   somule media so each has a total of approximately 4ml media  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":69,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":130,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8ht3h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"751CC471CF2611EDA9710A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"4D07D820CF2611EDB4BA716A1EC31138","height":402,"id":358686,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6v5jg","text":"Somules on same day of transformation (Image credit: Dr. Gabriel Rinaldi)","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Screenshot 2019-03-16 at 22.04.03.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k8jabdu5f.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k8i8bdu5f.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k8i9bdu5f.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k8i7bdu5f.webp","width":550}}}}

title: Schistosoma mansoni cercariae transformation (without needle)
warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"9ed9o","text":"Schistosomula in suspension are not a risk to humans UNLESS they are injected directly into the blood stream. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qgvg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
